animes.title: Akuyaku Reijou Level 99: Watashi wa Ura Boss desu ga Maou de wa Arimasen
animes.author: AT-X, BS11, Jumondou, Jumondou, KADOKAWA, TOKYO MX
animes.description:
This college kid wants nothing more than a quiet life. So when she’s reborn as Yumiella, the hidden villainess of an Otome RPG, she’s not exactly thrilled. Still yearning for peace, she abandons her evil duties to live a more discreet life. Until her gamer side kicks in and she accidentally reaches level 99! Now, everyone suspects that she’s the infamous Demon Lord. What future awaits her?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: CGI, Chuunibyou, Class Struggle, Comedy, Demons, Dragons, Fantasy, Female Protagonist, Heterosexual, Isekai, Kuudere, Magic, Ojou-sama, Reincarnation, Romance, School, Shoujo, Villainess

animes.title: ONE PIECE
animes.author: 4Kids Entertainment, Asahi Production, Asatsu DK, Avex Pictures, Fuji TV, Funimation, Magic Bus, Mushi Production, Studio Guts, TAP, Toei Animation
animes.description:
Gold Roger was known as the Pirate King, the strongest and most infamous being to have sailed the Grand Line. The capture and death of Roger by the World Government brought a change throughout the world. His last words before his death revealed the location of the greatest treasure in the world, One Piece. It was this revelation that brought about the Grand Age of Pirates, men who dreamed of finding One Piece (which promises an unlimited amount of riches and fame), and quite possibly the most coveted of titles for the person who found it, the title of the Pirate King.

Enter Monkey D. Luffy, a 17-year-old boy that defies your standard definition of a pirate. Rather than the popular persona of a wicked, hardened, toothless pirate who ransacks villages for fun, Luffy’s reason for being a pirate is one of pure wonder; the thought of an exciting adventure and meeting new and intriguing people, along with finding One Piece, are his reasons of becoming a pirate. Following in the footsteps of his childhood hero, Luffy and his crew travel across the Grand Line, experiencing crazy adventures, unveiling dark mysteries and battling strong enemies, all in order to reach One Piece.

*This includes following special episodes:
- Chopperman to the Rescue! Protect the TV Station by the Shore! (Episode 336)
- The Strongest Tag-Team! Luffy and Toriko's Hard Struggle! (Episode 492)
- Team Formation! Save Chopper (Episode 542)
- History's Strongest Collaboration vs. Glutton of the Sea (Episode 590)
- 20th Anniversary! Special Romance Dawn (Episode 907)
animes.genre: Achromatic, Acting, Action, Adoption, Adventure, Anachronism, Angels, Animals, Anti-Hero, Artificial Intelligence, Asexual, Assassins, Battle Royale, Body Swapping, CGI, Clone, Comedy, Coming of Age, Conspiracy, Crime, Cyborg, Desert, Dragons, Drama, Drugs, Dystopian, Ensemble Cast, Espionage, Fairy, Fantasy, Female Harem, Female Protagonist, Food, Found Family, Fugitive, Gender Bending, Gods, Guns, Henshin, Kuudere, Lost Civilization, Male Protagonist, Marriage, Medicine, Mermaid, Monster Boy, Monster Girl, Musical, Ninja, Pirates, Politics, Post-Apocalyptic, Primarily Adult Cast, Prison, Revenge, Robots, Samurai, Shapeshifting, Ships, Shounen, Skeleton, Slapstick, Slavery, Super Power, Swordplay, Time Manipulation, Time Skip, Tragedy, Trains, Travel, Unrequited Love, War, Zombie

animes.title: Ore dake Level Up na Ken
animes.author: A-1 Pictures, Aniplex, Crunchyroll, D&C MEDIA, Kakao piccoma, Netmarble
animes.description:
They say whatever doesn’t kill you makes you stronger, but that’s not the case for the world’s weakest hunter Sung Jinwoo. After being brutally slaughtered by monsters in a high-ranking dungeon, Jinwoo came back with the System, a program only he could see, that’s leveling him up in every way. Now, he’s inspired to discover the secrets behind his powers and the dungeon that spawned them.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Age Regression, Alternate Universe, Angels, Anti-Hero, Bullying, Cosmic Horror, Cultivation, Dragons, Dungeon, Dystopian, Fantasy, Gore, Heterosexual, Isekai, Magic, Male Protagonist, Necromancy, Post-Apocalyptic, Satire, Super Power, Swordplay, Time Manipulation, Tragedy, Travel, Urban Fantasy, War

animes.title: Sousou no Frieren
animes.author: Aniplex, Dentsu, MADHOUSE, Nippon Television Network, Shogakukan, Shogakukan-Shueisha Productions, Toho
animes.description:
The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. But Frieren will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to understand what life means to the people around her? Decades after their victory, the funeral of one her friends confronts Frieren with her own near immortality. Frieren sets out to fulfill the last wishes of her comrades and finds herself beginning a new adventure…


(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Adoption, Adventure, Afterlife, Asexual, Coming of Age, Demons, Dragons, Drama, Elf, Environmental, Episodic, Fantasy, Female Protagonist, Fishing, Heterosexual, Iyashikei, Kuudere, Magic, Philosophy, Rural, Shounen, Suicide, Time Skip, Tragedy, Travel, Witch, Zombie

animes.title: Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu 2nd Season
animes.author: A-Sketch, AQUA ARIS, AlphaPolis, BS Nittele, CTW, DMM.com, J.C. Staff, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Medicos Entertainment, NetEase Games, Nippon Television Network, TOKYO MX, VAP
animes.description:
The second season of Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu.

After Makoto Misumi defeats Mitsurugi and Sofia Bulga, humanity is saved from the attacking demon army—for the time being. The goddess is aware of Makoto’s growing power, and she sees him as less of a nuisance and more of a rival. Makoto continues his journey to further expand his community of outcasts and connect with more hyumans. But will he be strong enough to hold off the coming storm?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Anthropomorphism, Comedy, Dragons, Fantasy, Female Harem, Food, Gods, Isekai, Language Barrier, Magic, Male Protagonist, Meta, Samurai

animes.title: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto
animes.author: Dentsu, Imagica Infos, Nippon Television Network, OLM, Shogakukan, Square Enix, TOHO animation STUDIO, Toho
animes.description:
Maomao lived a peaceful life with her apothecary father. Until one day, she’s sold as a lowly servant to the emperor’s palace. But she wasn’t meant for a compliant life among royalty. So when imperial heirs fall ill, she decides to step in and find a cure! This catches the eye of Jinshi, a handsome palace official who promotes her. Now, she’s making a name for herself solving medical mysteries!


(Source: Crunchyroll)

animes.description: The second season of MASHLE, adapting the Divine Visionary Candidate Exam Arc.

animes.title: Dosanko Gal wa Namaramenkoi
animes.author: BLADE, Bit Grooove Promotion, DMM.com, Pony Canyon, SILVER LINK., TV Hokkaidou, TV Tokyo
animes.description:
Snowflakes aren’t the only things dropping in Hokkaido—so are jaws, thanks to the super adorable gals who are turning the icy north into a hotbed of fashion and fun. Brace yourself for a winter storm of laughs, love, and killer outfits as these gals prove that being cute is an all-season affair. Here, frostbite meets fashionista!


(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Comedy, Female Harem, Female Protagonist, Gyaru, Heterosexual, Kuudere, Love Triangle, Male Protagonist, Nudity, Romance, Rural, School, Shounen, Slice of Life, Snowscape, Surreal Comedy

animes.title: Shangri-La Frontier
animes.author: C2C, Kodansha
animes.description:
"When was the last time I played a game that wasn't crap?" This is a world in the near future where games that use display screens are classified as retro. Anything that can't keep up with state-of-the-art VR technology is called a "crap game," and you see a large number of crap games coming out. Those who devote their lives to clearing these games are called "crap-game hunters," and Rakuro Hizutome is one of them. The game he's chosen to tackle next is Shangri-La Frontier, a "god-tier game" that has a total of thirty million players. Online friends... An expansive world... Encounters with rivals... These are changing Rakuro and all the other players' fates! The best game adventure tale by the strongest "crap game" player begins now!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Animals, Anthropomorphism, Assassins, Comedy, Fantasy, Gender Bending, Goblin, Heterosexual, Hikikomori, Kemonomimi, Male Protagonist, Otaku Culture, POV, Primarily Teen Cast, Sci-Fi, Shapeshifting, Shounen, Super Power, Swordplay, Travel, Video Games, Virtual World

animes.title: Ninja Kamui
animes.author: Adult Swim, E&H Production, Sola Entertainment
animes.description:
Higan is a Nukenin - a former ninja who escaped his clan and is hiding from his violent past in rural America with his family. One night, he is ambushed by a team of assassins from his former organization who exact a bloody retribution on Joe and his family for betraying their ancient code. Rising from his seeming “death,” Joe will re-emerge as his former self - Ninja Kamui - to avenge his family and friends. Kamui is a 21st century ninja, a shadowy anachronism who pits his ancient skills against high-tech weaponry with brutal finesse. He must face off against trained assassins, combat cyborgs, and rival ninjas to bring down the very clan that made him.


(Source: Warner Bros. Discovery)
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Anti-Hero, Assassins, Crime, Cyberpunk, Cyborg, Detective, Drama, Gore, Henshin, Male Protagonist, Ninja, Police, Primarily Adult Cast, Revenge, Sci-Fi, Swordplay, Tokusatsu, Tragedy, Urban

animes.title: Oroka na Tenshi wa Akuma to Odoru
animes.author: AT-X, Children's Playground Entertainment, Crunchyroll, Docomo Anime Store, KADOKAWA, Movic, Nihon Keizai Koukokusha, Pony Canyon, TV Tokyo
animes.description:
Masatora Akutsu, a demon on a recruitment mission in a human high school, is drafting allies for Hell against the heavenly angels. But when seated beside the captivating Lily Amane, he’s in for a devilishly hilarious celestial surprise!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Angels, Comedy, Demons, Heterosexual, Romance, School, Seinen, Supernatural

animes.title: Yubisaki to Renren
animes.author: Ajiado, Ajiado, Crunchyroll, Kodansha, Mainichi Broadcasting System, NBCUniversal Entertainment Japan, NetEase Games, TOKYO MX
animes.description:
Yuki Itose is just a typical student dealing with the pressures of college. She is struggling one day on the train when an upperclassman named Itsuomi Nagi helps her out. As he gradually opens a new world to her, Yuki develops feelings for Itsuomi. A pure love story begins to grow.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Bar, Chibi, College, Disability, Female Protagonist, Heterosexual, Iyashikei, Language Barrier, Love Triangle, Primarily Adult Cast, Romance, Shoujo, Slice of Life, Unrequited Love, Urban

animes.title: Loop 7-kaime no Akuyaku Reijou wa, Moto Tekikoku de Jiyuu Kimamana Hanayome Seikatsu wo Mankitsu Suru
animes.author: AT-X, Crunchyroll, Docomo Anime Store, HORNETS, MAGNET, MUSE, OVERLAP, Pony Canyon, Studio KAI
animes.description:
Rishe Irmgard Weitzner, a duke's daughter, has a secret: she died at the age of 20 and returned to the moment five years prior when her engagement was called off. She has already experienced this time loop six times and lived out those five years a different way each time, as a merchant, a doctor, a maid, a knight, and more. Now, on her seventh go-around, she's determined to live to a ripe old age and spend it relaxing. But the moment she flees the castle with that decision in her heart, she runs into the infamously cruel crown prince of a rival kingdom, Arnold Hein. He happens to be the one who killed her during her life as a knight, but now, he seems to have taken a bizarre liking to her... and begs her to become his wife. Thus, in order to stay alive and prevent a war, Rishe utilizes her previous experiences to kick off her seventh life as the bride of an enemy nation's crown prince.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Agriculture, Alchemy, Economics, Fantasy, Female Protagonist, Kuudere, Medicine, Ojou-sama, Politics, Reincarnation, Romance, Shoujo, Swordplay, Time Loop, Time Manipulation, Tomboy, Villainess

animes.title: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu 2nd Season
animes.author: Akita Shoten, Avex Pictures, BS Asahi, Dentsu, Movic, Shin-Ei Animation, Shin-Ei Animation, TV Asahi, TV Asahi Music
animes.description: The second season of Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu.
animes.genre: Basketball, Comedy, Coming of Age, Female Protagonist, Heterosexual, Male Protagonist, Primarily Teen Cast, Romance, School, Shounen, Slice of Life

animes.title: Dungeon Meshi
animes.author: Good Smile Company, KADOKAWA, Tencent, Trigger, Ultra Super Pictures
animes.description:
When young adventurer Laios and his company are attacked and soundly thrashed by a dragon deep in a dungeon, the party loses all its money and provisions...and a member! They're eager to go back and save her, but there is just one problem: If they set out with no food or coin to speak of, they're sure to starve on the way! But Laios comes up with a brilliant idea: "Let's eat the monsters!" Slimes, basilisks, and even dragons...none are safe from the appetites of these dungeon-crawling gourmands! 

(Source: Yen Press)


Note: A world premiere screening of Episode 1 was shown in the Studio TRIGGER panel at Anime Expo on July 1, 2023.
animes.genre: Adventure, Anthropomorphism, Comedy, Dragons, Dungeon, Elf, Ensemble Cast, Episodic, Fantasy, Food, Foreign, Magic, Primarily Adult Cast, Seinen, Zombie

animes.title: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e 3rd Season
animes.author: AT-X, Bandai Namco Music Live, Crunchyroll, KADOKAWA, Kadokawa Media House, Lerche, Movic, Sammy, Studio Hibari
animes.description:
The third season of Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e.

The third semester kicks off in high gear with a special boot camp deep in the mountains. Forcibly separated into groups along grade and gender lines, the first, second and third years alike must work together to survive the rugged terrain. Even worse? The leader of the group that comes in last will be expelled. Can Class D make it back to campus intact, or is this where they finally say goodbye to one of their own?

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
animes.genre: Anti-Hero, Athletics, Battle Royale, Board Game, Bullying, Coming of Age, Conspiracy, Crime, Delinquents, Denpa, Disability, Drama, Ensemble Cast, Female Harem, Fugitive, Kuudere, Love Triangle, Male Protagonist, Philosophy, Politics, Primarily Teen Cast, Psychological, Rehabilitation, Revenge, School, School Club, Suicide, Survival, Tsundere, Yandere

animes.title: Undead Unluck
animes.author: David Production, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Shueisha, TMS Entertainment
animes.description:
All Fuuko wants is a passionate romance like the one in her favorite shoujo manga. Unfortunately, her Unluck ability makes that impossible. But just as Fuuko hits rock bottom, Andy sweeps her off her feet—literally! Now she's become Andy's unwilling test subject as he works to find a way to trigger a stroke of Unluck big enough to kill him for good. However, when the pair discovers a secret organization is hunting them, it puts Andy's burial plans on hold.

(Source: Viz Media)
animes.genre: Action, Age Gap, Aliens, Body Horror, Comedy, Cosmic Horror, Dissociative Identities, Female Protagonist, Gore, Heterosexual, Male Protagonist, Martial Arts, Memory Manipulation, Meta, Nudity, Post-Apocalyptic, Primarily Adult Cast, Real Robot, Sci-Fi, Shounen, Suicide, Super Power, Supernatural, Time Loop, Tragedy, Tsundere, Zombie

animes.title: Jujutsu Kaisen 2nd Season
animes.author: MAPPA, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Shueisha, Sumzap, Toho
animes.description:
The second season of Jujutsu Kaisen.

The past comes to light when second-year students Satoru Gojou and Suguru Getou are tasked with escorting young Riko Amanai to Master Tengen. But when a non-sorcerer user tries to kill them, their mission to protect the Star Plasma Vessel threatens to turn them into bitter enemies and cement their destinies—one as the world’s strongest sorcerer, and the other its most twisted curse user!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Agender, Battle Royale, Body Horror, Cannibalism, Demons, Drama, Ensemble Cast, Female Protagonist, Gore, Guns, Magic, Male Protagonist, Primarily Male Cast, Primarily Teen Cast, Real Robot, Reincarnation, Revenge, Rotoscoping, Shounen, Super Power, Supernatural, Swordplay, Time Manipulation, Tragedy, Urban Fantasy, Youkai

animes.title: Ragna Crimson
animes.author: BS11, GREE Entertainment, King Records, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Movic, SILVER LINK., Sentai Filmworks, Square Enix, newgin
animes.description:
Dragons reign terror over the earth, sea and sky. If sworn dragon hunters like Ragna are to have any hope of dealing death to these seemingly invincible, fire-breathing beasts, they must find a way to level the odds. Ragna teams up with a mysterious man named Crimson who has likewise sworn to stand against the dragons menacing the world. But although Crimson’s motivations may be mysterious, his goal and Ragna’s perfectly align, and together they’ll fight to vanquish the dragons once and for all.

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

Note: The first episode aired with a runtime of ~47 minutes.
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Anti-Hero, Dragons, Fantasy, Gender Bending, Gore, Magic, Male Protagonist, Mystery, Nekomimi, Orphan, Revenge, Shounen, Super Power, Swordplay, Time Manipulation, Tsundere, War

animes.title: Chiyu Mahou no Machigatta Tsukaikata
animes.author: Bandai Namco Music Live, Capybara, Crunchyroll, Frontier Works, GREE Entertainment, Shin-Ei Animation, Shin-Ei Animation, Studio Add
animes.description:
An ordinary walk home from school turns into an epic journey for Usato. After suddenly being dropped into another world with two fellow students, Usato learns he was summoned there by accident. But things turn around when he discovers a unique aptitude for healing magic! Now, he trains beyond human limitations, using his self-healing abilities to gain absurd strength and unrivaled stamina.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Animals, Demons, Fantasy, Female Harem, Heterosexual, Isekai, Kemonomimi, Magic, Male Protagonist, Military, Swordplay, War

animes.title: Hime-sama, "Goumon" no Jikan desu
animes.author: AbemaTV, BANDAI SPIRITS, BS11, Bushiroad, JR Higashi Nihon Kikaku, Kansai TV, PINE JAM, PINE JAM, Shogakukan-Shueisha Productions, TOKYO MX, Universal Music
animes.description:
As the war between the Imperial Army and Hellhorde rages on, the Princess, despite being armed with her mythical sword Excalibur, is captured and imprisoned. What kind of torture does she face at the hands of the chief demon interrogator? Fluffy fresh-baked toast! Hot, steaming ramen! Oh, the humanity! Can the Princess withstand these tormenting treats and keep her kingdom’s secrets safe?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Comedy, Cute Girls Doing Cute Things, Demons, Episodic, Fantasy, Female Protagonist, Food, Gyaru, Iyashikei, LGBTQ+ Themes, Monster Girl, Slapstick, Surreal Comedy, Tanned Skin

animes.title: HUNTER×HUNTER (2011)
animes.author: MADHOUSE, Nippon Television Network, Studio Live, VAP, Viz Media
animes.description:
A new adaption of the manga of the same name by Togashi Yoshihiro.

A Hunter is one who travels the world doing all sorts of dangerous tasks. From capturing criminals to searching deep within uncharted lands for any lost treasures. Gon is a young boy whose father disappeared long ago, being a Hunter. He believes if he could also follow his father's path, he could one day reunite with him.

After becoming 12, Gon leaves his home and takes on the task of entering the Hunter exam, notorious for its low success rate and high probability of death to become an official Hunter. He befriends the revenge-driven Kurapika, the doctor-to-be Leorio and the rebellious ex-assassin Killua in the exam, with their friendship prevailing throughout the many trials and threats they come upon taking on the dangerous career of a Hunter.
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Animals, Anthropomorphism, Anti-Hero, Assassins, Board Game, Body Horror, Boys' Love, Card Battle, Chimera, Coming of Age, Crime, Cultivation, Ensemble Cast, Environmental, Fantasy, Found Family, Gangs, Gender Bending, Gore, Mafia, Male Protagonist, Martial Arts, Masturbation, Philosophy, Politics, Primarily Male Cast, Primarily Teen Cast, Revenge, Shogi, Shounen, Super Power, Tragedy, Travel, Urban Fantasy, Video Games, Virtual World, Vore, Yandere

animes.title: MASHLE
animes.author: A-1 Pictures, ADK Marketing Solutions, Aniplex, Shueisha
animes.description:
This is a world of magic. This is a world in which magic is casually used by everyone.

In a deep, dark forest in this world of magic, there is a boy who is singlemindedly working out. His name is Mash Burnedead, and he has a secret. He can’t use magic. 

All he wanted was to live a quiet life with his family, but people suddenly start trying to kill him one day and he somehow finds himself enrolled in Magic School. There, he sets his sights on becoming a “Divine Visionary,” the elite of the elite. 
 Will his ripped muscles work against the best and brightest of the wizarding world? The curtain rises on this off-kilter magical fantasy in which the power of being jacked crushes any spell!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Adoption, Battle Royale, Bullying, CGI, Chimera, Comedy, Dragons, Fantasy, Fitness, Kuudere, Magic, Male Protagonist, Parody, Philosophy, Primarily Male Cast, Primarily Teen Cast, School, Shounen, Slapstick, Super Power

animes.title: Black Clover
animes.author: Crunchyroll, Funimation, Shueisha, Studio Pierrot, TV Tokyo
animes.description:
In a world where magic is everything, Asta and Yuno are both found abandoned at a church on the same day. While Yuno is gifted with exceptional magical powers, Asta is the only one in this world without any. At the age of fifteen, both receive grimoires, magic books that amplify their holder’s magic. Asta’s is a rare Grimoire of Anti-Magic that negates and repels his opponent’s spells. Being opposite but good rivals, Yuno and Asta are ready for the hardest of challenges to achieve their common dream: to be the Wizard King. Giving up is never an option!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Adoption, Adventure, Age Regression, Bullying, Class Struggle, Comedy, Conspiracy, Cult, Cultivation, Demons, Disability, Dissociative Identities, Dungeon, Elf, Ensemble Cast, Espionage, Fantasy, Food, Found Family, Heterosexual, Kuudere, Lost Civilization, Love Triangle, Magic, Male Protagonist, Nun, Orphan, Reincarnation, Revenge, Shounen, Suicide, Super Power, Swordplay, Time Skip, Tomboy, Travel, Tsundere

animes.title: Shin no Nakama ja Nai to Yuusha no Party wo Oidasareta node, Henkyou de Slow Life suru Koto ni shimashita 2nd
animes.author: AT-X, BS Nittele, KADOKAWA, KBS Kyoto, Nippon Columbia, Studio Flad
animes.description:
The second season of Shin no Nakama ja Nai to Yuusha no Party wo Oidasareta node, Henkyou de Slow Life suru Koto ni shimashita.

A once-great Hero is now living the slow life. Red, shunned from his adventuring party, spends his days running an apothecary. He lives with his lifelong love, Princess Rit, and his sister, Ruti. They indulge in moments of bliss, like soaking in serene hot springs and enjoying delicious meals with a view. No matter what happens to the world around them, these happy moments will be unchanged.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Assassins, Elf, Family Life, Fantasy, Female Harem, Female Protagonist, Gore, Heterosexual, Horticulture, Magic, Male Protagonist, Romance, Slice of Life, Swordplay

animes.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
animes.author: MAPPA, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Shueisha, Sumzap, Toho
animes.description:
A boy fights... for "the right death."

Hardship, regret, shame: the negative feelings that humans feel become Curses that lurk in our everyday lives. The Curses run rampant throughout the world, capable of leading people to terrible misfortune and even death. What's more, the Curses can only be exorcised by another Curse.

Itadori Yuji is a boy with tremendous physical strength, though he lives a completely ordinary high school life. One day, to save a friend who has been attacked by Curses, he eats the finger of the Double-Faced Specter, taking the Curse into his own soul. From then on, he shares one body with the Double-Faced Specter. Guided by the most powerful of sorcerers, Gojou Satoru, Itadori is admitted to the Tokyo Metropolitan Technical High School of Sorcery, an organization that fights the Curses... and thus begins the heroic tale of a boy who became a Curse to exorcise a Curse, a life from which he could never turn back.


(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: The first episode received an early web premiere on September 19th, 2020. The regular TV broadcast started on October 3rd, 2020.
animes.genre: Action, Anthropomorphism, Baseball, Body Horror, Demons, Dissociative Identities, Drama, Ensemble Cast, Femboy, Gore, Magic, Male Protagonist, Martial Arts, Mythology, Primarily Male Cast, Primarily Teen Cast, Rape, Rotoscoping, School, School Club, Shapeshifting, Shounen, Slapstick, Super Power, Supernatural, Surreal Comedy, Swordplay, Tragedy, Urban Fantasy, Youkai

animes.title: Shingeki no Kyojin
animes.author: Dentsu, Kodansha, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Pony Canyon, Pony Canyon Enterprise, Production I.G, Wit Studio
animes.description:
Several hundred years ago, humans were nearly exterminated by titans. Titans are typically several stories tall, seem to have no intelligence, devour human beings and, worst of all, seem to do it for the pleasure rather than as a food source. A small percentage of humanity survived by walling themselves in a city protected by extremely high walls, even taller than the biggest of titans.

Flash forward to the present and the city has not seen a titan in over 100 years. Teenage boy Eren and his foster sister Mikasa witness something horrific as the city walls are destroyed by a colossal titan that appears out of thin air. As the smaller titans flood the city, the two kids watch in horror as their mother is eaten alive. Eren vows that he will murder every single titan and take revenge for all of mankind.

(Source: MangaHelpers)
animes.genre: Action, Adoption, Amnesia, CGI, Cannibalism, Class Struggle, Coming of Age, Drama, Dystopian, Ensemble Cast, Espionage, Fantasy, Gore, Kaiju, Male Protagonist, Memory Manipulation, Military, Monster Boy, Monster Girl, Mystery, Politics, Post-Apocalyptic, Primarily Male Cast, Primarily Teen Cast, Religion, Rural, Shapeshifting, Shounen, Suicide, Super Power, Survival, Swordplay, Time Skip, Tragedy, Yandere

animes.title: Mato Seihei no Slave
animes.author: AT-X, MAGNET, Pony Canyon, Seven Arcs, Yostar
animes.description:
Yuuki Wakura watches as dueling supernatural forces ravage the Earth. Mato are portals to another dimension, avenues from which dangerous monsters escape. Peaches are resources given to women granting them abilities. Chief of the Seventh Unity of the Anti-Demon Corp, Kyouka Uzen arrives to save Yuuki from a monster. Surprisingly, Yuuki holds the power to increase the Peaches effectiveness. But to save the world, Yuuki must be willing to become Kyouka’s servant both on the battlefield and at home.

(Source: HIDIVE)
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Alternate Universe, CGI, Demons, Drama, Ecchi, Fantasy, Feet, Female Harem, Female Protagonist, Gods, Guns, Heterosexual, Love Triangle, Male Protagonist, Monster Boy, Monster Girl, Nudity, Primarily Female Cast, Romance, Shapeshifting, Shounen, Slavery, Super Power, Swordplay, Urban Fantasy

animes.title: Kyuujitsu no Warumono-san
animes.author: KLOCKWORX, MAGNET, Nikkatsu, SCISSORS BLITZ, Shin-Ei Animation, Shin-Ei Animation, Square Enix, SynergySP, TV Osaka, TV Tokyo, VAP
animes.description:
The man known as General within a villainous organization that plans to take over the world is usually fighting to the death against the Rangers who protect the Earth...

But today is his day off.

To heal his tired soul from working so hard every day, he goes to the zoo to see pandas and to the convenience store to get some ice cream.

We get to see how a certain villain gets to completely enjoy his days off to the fullest in this comedy that will heal your soul.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Aliens, Animals, Comedy, Henshin, Iyashikei, Konbini, Male Protagonist, Monster Boy, Primarily Adult Cast, Shoujo, Slice of Life, Tokusatsu, Twins, Urban

animes.title: Nozomanu Fushi no Boukensha
animes.author: BS Nittele, CONNECT, Docomo Anime Store, Hakuhodo DY Music & Pictures, Marvelous, NatsumeAtari, OVERLAP, Pony Canyon
animes.description:
Rentt Faina has hunted monsters for the last 10 years. Sadly, he’s not great at his job, stuck hunting slimes and goblins for a few coins each day. His luck turns when he finds an undiscovered path. At the path’s end, he meets his demise in the maw of a legendary dragon. But, he wakes up as an undead bag of bones! He sets out to achieve Existential Evolution and rejoin the land of the living.

(Source: Crunchyroll)


Note: Each episode streamed 3 days early on some streaming sites. The original TV broadcast started on January 8th, 2024.
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Dungeon, Fantasy, Femboy, Magic, Male Protagonist, Monster Boy, Reincarnation, Skeleton, Time Skip, Vampire, Zombie

animes.title: Shinobanai! Crypto Ninja Sakuya Ni no Maki
animes.author: Fanworks
animes.description: No Description
animes.genre: Action, Comedy

animes.title: SHAMAN KING: FLOWERS
animes.author: Bridge, Dentsu, King Records, Kodansha, TV Tokyo
animes.description:
Sequel to SHAMAN KING (2021). 


The action returns in this brand-new sequel to SHAMAN KING! Hana Asakura finds that being the son of Yoh & Anna Asakura isn't all it's cracked up to be, and his boredom has him itching for any kind of excitement. But when a fight comes straight to his doorstep, it's from a place he least expects—his own family? The battle for Asakura supremacy begins!  


(Source: Kodansha USA)
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Ghost, Male Protagonist, Samurai, Shounen, Super Power, Supernatural, Swordplay, Urban Fantasy

animes.title: Akuyaku Reijou Level 99: Watashi wa Ura Boss desu ga Maou de wa Arimasen
animes.author: AT-X, BS11, Jumondou, Jumondou, KADOKAWA, TOKYO MX
animes.description:
This college kid wants nothing more than a quiet life. So when she’s reborn as Yumiella, the hidden villainess of an Otome RPG, she’s not exactly thrilled. Still yearning for peace, she abandons her evil duties to live a more discreet life. Until her gamer side kicks in and she accidentally reaches level 99! Now, everyone suspects that she’s the infamous Demon Lord. What future awaits her?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: CGI, Chuunibyou, Class Struggle, Comedy, Demons, Dragons, Fantasy, Female Protagonist, Heterosexual, Isekai, Kuudere, Magic, Ojou-sama, Reincarnation, Romance, School, Shoujo, Villainess

animes.title: Odekake Kozame
animes.author: ENGI, KADOKAWA
animes.description:
The story follows a little shark character, Kozame-chan's adventures in Yauo town, which smells "nostalgic." From radio exercises to festival stalls to meeting with friends, Kozame-chan has a variety of heartwarming experiences in the town. 

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Animals, Anthropomorphism, Episodic, Iyashikei, Kids, Slice of Life, Tragedy

animes.title: Tom to Jerry
animes.author: Fanworks, Studio Nanahoshi
animes.description:
To celebrate "Cheese Day," (November 11 in Japan), Cartoon Network Japan debuted an anime spin on Tom and Jerry that combines the fast-paced humor of the original with a cute, "pop" worldview. The pair are joined by the diaper-wearing Tuffy Mouse, another recurring character from the classic cartoon.


(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Animals, Anti-Hero, Comedy, Kids, No Dialogue, Slapstick

animes.title: Chiikawa
animes.author: Doga Kobo
animes.description:
The sometimes happy, sometimes sad, and a tad stressful daily life of "some sort of small, cute creature" known as Chiikawa. Chiikawa enjoys delicious food with bees and rabbits, toils hard every day for the rewards of work, and still maintains a smile.

(Source: Anime News Network)
animes.genre: Animals, Comedy, Dystopian, Food, Iyashikei, Kids, Outdoor, Primarily Child Cast, Slice of Life, Surreal Comedy, Work

animes.title: Dokonjou Gaeru Yanen
animes.author: DLE
animes.description: No Description
animes.genre: Comedy

animes.title: Oroka na Tenshi wa Akuma to Odoru
animes.author: AT-X, Children's Playground Entertainment, Crunchyroll, Docomo Anime Store, KADOKAWA, Movic, Nihon Keizai Koukokusha, Pony Canyon, TV Tokyo
animes.description:
Masatora Akutsu, a demon on a recruitment mission in a human high school, is drafting allies for Hell against the heavenly angels. But when seated beside the captivating Lily Amane, he’s in for a devilishly hilarious celestial surprise!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Angels, Comedy, Demons, Heterosexual, Romance, School, Seinen, Supernatural

animes.title: Dosanko Gal wa Namaramenkoi
animes.author: BLADE, Bit Grooove Promotion, DMM.com, Pony Canyon, SILVER LINK., TV Hokkaidou, TV Tokyo
animes.description:
Snowflakes aren’t the only things dropping in Hokkaido—so are jaws, thanks to the super adorable gals who are turning the icy north into a hotbed of fashion and fun. Brace yourself for a winter storm of laughs, love, and killer outfits as these gals prove that being cute is an all-season affair. Here, frostbite meets fashionista!


(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Comedy, Female Harem, Female Protagonist, Gyaru, Heterosexual, Kuudere, Love Triangle, Male Protagonist, Nudity, Romance, Rural, School, Shounen, Slice of Life, Snowscape, Surreal Comedy

animes.author: 8-bit, BANDAI SPIRITS, Bandai Namco Entertainment, Bandai Namco Filmworks, Bandai Namco Music Live
animes.description: The second cour of SYNDUALITY Noir.

animes.title: Hime-sama, "Goumon" no Jikan desu
animes.author: AbemaTV, BANDAI SPIRITS, BS11, Bushiroad, JR Higashi Nihon Kikaku, Kansai TV, PINE JAM, PINE JAM, Shogakukan-Shueisha Productions, TOKYO MX, Universal Music
animes.description:
As the war between the Imperial Army and Hellhorde rages on, the Princess, despite being armed with her mythical sword Excalibur, is captured and imprisoned. What kind of torture does she face at the hands of the chief demon interrogator? Fluffy fresh-baked toast! Hot, steaming ramen! Oh, the humanity! Can the Princess withstand these tormenting treats and keep her kingdom’s secrets safe?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Comedy, Cute Girls Doing Cute Things, Demons, Episodic, Fantasy, Female Protagonist, Food, Gyaru, Iyashikei, LGBTQ+ Themes, Monster Girl, Slapstick, Surreal Comedy, Tanned Skin

animes.title: Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu 2nd Season
animes.author: A-Sketch, AQUA ARIS, AlphaPolis, BS Nittele, CTW, DMM.com, J.C. Staff, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Medicos Entertainment, NetEase Games, Nippon Television Network, TOKYO MX, VAP
animes.description:
The second season of Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu.

After Makoto Misumi defeats Mitsurugi and Sofia Bulga, humanity is saved from the attacking demon army—for the time being. The goddess is aware of Makoto’s growing power, and she sees him as less of a nuisance and more of a rival. Makoto continues his journey to further expand his community of outcasts and connect with more hyumans. But will he be strong enough to hold off the coming storm?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

animes.genre: Aliens, Animals, Comedy, Henshin, Iyashikei, Konbini, Male Protagonist, Monster Boy, Primarily Adult Cast, Shoujo, Slice of Life, Tokusatsu, Twins, Urban

animes.title: Meiji Gekken: 1874
animes.author: Crunchyroll, Tsumugi Akita Anime Lab
animes.description:
By 1874, seven years have passed since the end of the samurai era. A former samurai, Shizuma Orikasa works as a rickshaw driver in Tokyo while looking for his fiancée, Sumie Kanomata, who went missing during the Boshin War. Shizuma thwarts an assassination attempt and joins the newly established police department, where he’ll fight to stop dark forces from overthrowing the government.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Conspiracy, Detective, Drama, Drugs, Gore, Guns, Historical, Male Protagonist, Mystery, Oiran, Police, Politics, Primarily Adult Cast, Samurai, Swordplay, Tragedy, Urban, Yakuza

animes.title: Kamisama Hajimemashita
animes.author: DAX Production, Dentsu, Funimation, Hakusensha, Pony Canyon, Sotsu, TMS Entertainment, TV Tokyo
animes.description:
Nanami Momozono is alone and homeless after her dad skips town to evade his gambling debts and the debt collectors kick her out of her apartment. So when a man she's just saved from a dog offers her his home, she jumps at the opportunity. But it turns out that his place is a shrine, and Nanami has unwittingly taken over his job as a local deity! 

Nanami has all kinda of new responsibilities she doesn't understand, dangers she's unaware of, and a cranky ex-familiar who's... actually pretty hot. What's a new-fledged godling to do? 

(Source: Viz Media)
animes.genre: Age Gap, Anthropomorphism, Bullying, Comedy, Demons, Episodic, Fantasy, Female Harem, Female Protagonist, Gods, Heterosexual, Kemonomimi, Love Triangle, Male Harem, Meta, Monster Boy, Romance, School, Shoujo, Slavery, Supernatural, Time Manipulation, Tsundere, Urban Fantasy, Youkai

animes.title: Accel World
animes.author: ASCII Media Works, Genco, Rakuonsha, Sunrise, Viz Media, Warner Bros. Japan, flying DOG
animes.description:
The year is 2046. Haruyuki Arita is a young boy who finds himself on the lowest social rungs of his school. Ashamed of his miserable life, Haruyuki can only cope by indulging in virtual games. But that all changes when Kuroyukihime, the most popular girl in school, introduces him to a mysterious program called Brain Burst and a virtual reality called the Accel World. 

(Source: VIZ Media)
animes.genre: Action, Augmented Reality, Bullying, Henshin, Isekai, Kuudere, Male Protagonist, Motorcycles, Netorare, Philosophy, Primarily Teen Cast, Romance, School, Sci-Fi, Time Manipulation, Tokusatsu, Video Games, Virtual World

animes.title: World Trigger
animes.author: TV Asahi, Toei Animation
animes.description:
One day, a gate to another world suddenly opens in Mikado City. Aliens invincible to Earth’s weapons, called “Neighbors”, start coming over. Earth’s only line of defense is a mysterious group called the “Border” who are armed with weapons called “Triggers”.
 
Four years later, the city has recovered from initial attacks and citizens of Mikado City have started to get use to the Neighbor’s attacks. Yuma Kuga, a transfer student, and his classmate Osamu Mikumo find themselves fighting a Neighbor that suddenly appears. Osamu, who is actually a Border agent, activates his Trigger but is unable to defeat it. This leaves Yuma to activate his own Trigger and defeat the alien. Yuma reveals that he is not part of Border and is actually a Neighbor who has transferred from the other side.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Aliens, Battle Royale, Ensemble Cast, Guns, Isekai, Male Protagonist, Military, Primarily Teen Cast, Robots, School, Sci-Fi, Shounen, Supernatural, Swordplay, Tragedy

animes.title: Kokoro ga Sakebitagatterun da.
animes.author: A-1 Pictures
animes.description:
Jun is a girl whose words have been sealed away. She was once a very happy girl, but because of a certain thing she said when she was very young, her family was torn apart. One day, the egg fairy appeared in front of her and sealed away her ability to talk in order to stop her from hurting anybody else. Since this traumatic experience, Jun lives in the shadows away from the limelight. But, one day, she is nominated to become an executive member of the "community outreach council." On top of that, Jun is also appointed to play the main lead in their musical...

(Source: Official website)
animes.genre: Baseball, Chuunibyou, Coming of Age, Drama, Family Life, Female Protagonist, Heterosexual, Love Triangle, Music, Musical, Rehabilitation, Romance, School, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

animes.title: HELLO WORLD
animes.author: Graphinica
animes.description: In Kyoto in the year 2027, Naomi Katagaki, a male high school student encounters a person who is claiming to be Naomi from 10 years in the future. Together, they must change the future and save a classmate, Ruri, whom the younger Naomi starts to date in three months.
animes.genre: Age Regression, Alternate Universe, Augmented Reality, Coming of Age, Drama, Female Protagonist, Full CGI, Heterosexual, Kuudere, Magic, Male Protagonist, Psychological, Rehabilitation, Romance, School, Sci-Fi, Time Manipulation, Tragedy, Urban, Virtual World

animes.title: Kono Sekai no Katasumi ni
animes.author: Animatsu Entertainment, Genco, MAPPA
animes.description:
The story follows a young lady named Suzu Urano, who in 1944 moves to the small town of Kure in Hiroshima to live with her husband's family. Suzu's life is thrown into chaos when her town is bombed during World War II. Her perseverance and courage underpin this heart-warming and inspirational tale of the everyday challenges faced by the Japanese in the midst of a violent, war-torn country. This beautiful yet poignant tale shows that even in the face of adversity and loss, people can come together and rebuild their lives.

(Source: Shout! Factory)
animes.genre: Disability, Drama, Drawing, Family Life, Female Protagonist, Heterosexual, Historical, Rehabilitation, Seinen, Slice of Life, Tragedy, War

animes.title: Leadale no Daichi nite
animes.author: Bandai Namco Arts, Crunchyroll, KADOKAWA, Kadokawa Media House, Maho Film, Simplicity, Sun Television
animes.description:
After being put on life support after a tragic accident, Keina Kagami's only freedom comes from the VRMMO RPG Leadale. One day her life support system shuts off and Keina passes away. When she wakes up, she finds herself in Leadale two hundred years in the future. As the high elf Cayna, with lost skills but incredible stats, she must forge relationships with the residents of this new world... which, shockingly, include the ""children"" characters she designed herself! A leisurely adventure tale is about to begin, featuring a girl transported to a game world and the smiles and tears she shares with her quirky companions!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
animes.genre: Adoption, Adventure, Chibi, Cute Girls Doing Cute Things, Elf, Fantasy, Female Protagonist, Gender Bending, Isekai, Iyashikei, Magic, Mermaid, Primarily Female Cast, Super Power, Travel, Video Games, Virtual World, Zombie

animes.title: Subarashiki Kono Sekai The Animation
animes.author: Domerica, Shin-Ei Animation, Square Enix
animes.description:
Neku awakens in the middle of Shibuya's bustling Scramble Crossing with no memory of how he got there. Little does he know, he's been transported to an alternate plane of existence known as the Underground (UG). Now an unwilling participant in the mysterious "Reapers' Game," Neku must partner up with a girl named Shiki in order to survive. Together, they complete missions and defeat monsters known as "Noise" as they gradually uncover the true nature of this twisted Game.


"There's only one way to stay alive in Shibuya: trust your partner." Will they survive the Reapers' Game?


(Source: Official Site)
animes.genre: Action, Afterlife, Amnesia, Angels, CGI, Coming of Age, Death Game, Hikikomori, Male Protagonist, Memory Manipulation, Rehabilitation, Supernatural, Survival, Tragedy, Urban, Urban Fantasy

animes.title: Accel World EX
animes.author: Sunrise
animes.description:
OVA bundled with the Accel World simulation and action games.  The Blu-ray OVA discs came with the PS3 limited edition versions and the DVD with the PSP limited edition versions.

The project was split into two PSP and PS3 titles, and one episode was released with each game:
#EX01: Reverberation;Zankyou (bundled with Stage:01 Ginyoku no Kakusei)
#EX02: Vacation;Onsen (bundled with Stage:02 Kasoku no Chouten)
animes.genre: Action, Isekai, Kuudere, Romance, School, Sci-Fi, Virtual World

animes.title: Animatrix
animes.author: DNA, Horipro, MADHOUSE, Square Enix, Square Pictures, Studio 4°C, Warner Bros. Japan
animes.description:
1. Final Flight of the Osiris
The crew of the Osiris discover an army preparing to invade Zion. While one crew member races inside the Matrix to get the message to Zion, the others try desperately to buy her enough time while fighting off an onslaught of Sentinels they can't possibly defeat.

2-3. The Second Renaissance Part 1 and 2
Humans have created the ultimate AI, which is just as smart as they are. But complications arise when these robots and the humans try to exist peacefully, and eventually all-out war breaks out. The humans ultimately lose the war, and become trapped in the Matrix as seen in the live-action films.

4. Kid's Story
A young man discovers that his world isn't real, that it's a computer-generated fantasy land created by robots using humans for energy. He escapes with the help of the hacker Neo. Based on the Matrix trilogy. 

5. Program
Cis and Duo engage in battle in a virtual recreation of Feudal Japan. 

6. World Record
While running the fastest race in his life, a champion track star breaks free of his computer-generated world for a small period of time. When he goes back to the real world, he has no memories and is placed in a nursing home. Based on the Matrix trilogy.

7. Beyond
While looking for her lost pet, a young woman meets up with some kids in Tokyo to play in a "haunted house", which is really a glitch in their computer world. Based on the Matrix trilogy.

8. Detective Story
A detective named Ash is called upon by a mysterious organization to hunt down the notorious hacker Trinity.

9. Matriculated
A group of scientists capture a robot and place it in a surreal fantasy world. When the robot's friends come in and kill most of the scientists, however, the robot and the last scientist remaining face isolation in the computer-generated world. Based on the Matrix trilogy.


(Source: Anime News Network)
animes.genre: Action, Anthology, Artificial Intelligence, CGI, Cyberpunk, Denpa, Drama, Dystopian, Gore, Nudity, POV, Psychological, Robots, Sci-Fi, Skateboarding, Virtual World, War

animes.title: Hetalia World Series
animes.author: Frontier Works, Funimation, Studio DEEN
animes.description:
The third and fourth seasons of the Hetalia Axis Powers anime. A continuation of the first 2 seasons under a new name, still adapting the online webcomics drawn by Himaruya Hidekaz.

Based on a popular web-released manga series by Hidekazu Himaruya, this has been described as a "cynical gag" story set in Europe in the years between WW1 and WW2 (1915-1939), using exaggerated caricatures of the different nationalities as portrayed by a gaggle of bishōnen. For example, the Italia Veneziano character is into pasta and women. The Deutsche (German) bishi loves potatoes and sausages, and Nippon is an otaku boy. Installments of the manga have jumped back and forth in setting from the ancient times to modern-day geopolitics. The manga's title comes the Japanese words for "useless" (hetare) and Italy (Italia).

(Source: ANI)
animes.genre: Chibi, Comedy, Cute Boys Doing Cute Things, Educational, Ensemble Cast, Historical, Parody, Primarily Male Cast

animes.title: Another World
animes.description:
The story features the point of view of the Naomi from 10 years in the future.

Episodes:
1. Record 2027 (2019/09/13)
2. Record 2032 (2019/09/27)
3. Record 2036 (2019/10/04)
animes.genre: Full CGI, Kuudere, Sci-Fi

animes.title: Glass no Hana to Kowasu Sekai
animes.author: A-1 Pictures, Pony Canyon
animes.description:
A floating space without gravity where an infinite number of lights shine in different colors: The "Box of Wisdom." Inside of this box, there are multiple worlds, multiple timelines, and there used to be many different people. This is where Dual and Dorothy were fighting with enemies called "Viruses." Worlds infected by viruses must be erased. That is the duty, the job of these girls. However, one day, Dual and Dorothy feel the presence of a new Virus. Arriving at the scene, they see a girl being attacked by Viruses. After saving the girl, the duo wait for her to awaken so they can ask who she is, where she came from, and where she is going. Finally, when the girl opened her eyes, she gave her name, Rimo, and whispered only one sentence... "I must return to the flower patch..."


(Source: Anime News Network)
animes.genre: Amnesia, Artificial Intelligence, Cute Girls Doing Cute Things, Drama, Female Protagonist, Mahou Shoujo, Mystery, Post-Apocalyptic, Primarily Female Cast, Sci-Fi, Tragedy, Virtual World

animes.author: Kyoto Animation
animes.description: Picture drama specials bundled with the main series' Blu-ray/DVD volumes.
animes.genre: Comedy, Fantasy, Kuudere, Supernatural

animes.title: Aoi Sekai no Chuushin de
animes.author: DAX Production, Fifth Avenue
animes.description: Segua Kingdom has been losing the war against Ninterdo Empire but the tables are turned by the appearance of a boy called Gear. All the characters are parodies of Nintendo or Sega games such as Sonic the Hedgehog, Super Mario Bros., The Legend of Zelda etc.
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Ecchi, Fantasy, Parody, Shounen, Super Power

animes.title: Accel World: Acchel World.
animes.author: J.C. Staff, Viz Media
animes.description: Spin-off of Accel World included on the Accel World Blu-rays & DVDs.
animes.genre: Comedy, Ensemble Cast, Isekai, Kuudere, Parody, School, Sci-Fi, Shounen, Virtual World

animes.title: Major: World Series
animes.author: SynergySP
animes.description:
According to Weekly Shonen Sunday, a new OVA of manga "Major" was announced to be released in December. The World Series chapter, which was skipped in the TV series, will be animated. This OVA will be the final anime of Major.

(Source: Scan of WSS)
animes.genre: Baseball, Comedy, Drama, Sports

animes.title: Sweat Punch
animes.author: Horipro, Studio 4°C
animes.description:
Sweat Punch is a series of five Studio 4°C shorts collected as a direct-to-DVD package film entitled Deep Imagination.

1. Tanpetori Kyouju no Yuuutsu (タンペトリー教授の憂鬱, Professor Dan Petory's Blues)
A musical number starring a hand puppet named Junior. The puppet is controlled by the drunken Professor Dan Petory who explains in puppetry the answers to such questions as why the Earth is blue and why UFOs fly in a zig-zag pattern.

2. End of the World
"End of the World" is a science fiction story about a young alien girl named Yuko as she escapes from the world of humans. After meeting Kazumi, a human girl Yuko met at a rock concert, the girls head to Kazumi's apartment. Before Yuko even takes off her shoes, however, she leaves through Kazumi's TV with her trusty cybernetic steed FACE to wage a retaliatory campaign against hordes of S&M monsters from another dimension, and the evil queen of Yuko's world.

3. Kigeki (喜劇, Comedy)
Set during the Irish War of Independence, a five-year old girl goes out in search of the mysterious Demon’s Castle - home of the Black Knight whose services she hopes to recruit. The Black Knight is a dark, young, skilled swordsman who will only accept a particular genre of books as advance payment.

4. Higan (彼岸, Enlightenment)
An injured man lies completely still in a hospital room with doctors hovering at his bedside, appearing serene and peaceful as he slowly succumbs to death. However, in his own mind, memories of a recent battle vividly flash by. Thoughts of death and chaos haunt him, even in his final moments.

5. Garakuta no Machi (ガラクタの町, Junk Town)
One summer day, a young boy encounters a little robot at a shopping arcade-a hungry little robot, it turns out, as he devours one machine after the other, growing in size with each "meal". This story of a boy, a machine, and their little adventure is the tale of an unusual friendship, enriched by the details of daily life and seen through the director's unique visual style.

(Source: Studio 4°C website)
animes.genre: Action, Aliens, Anthology, CGI, Demons, Fantasy, Historical, Horror, Mecha, Music, Musical, Real Robot, Sci-Fi, War

animes.title: Yoru no Kuni
animes.author: studio daisy
animes.description:
An animation project directed by Ryouchimo (Ryo-timo), made as a companion piece to Aimer's album "Walpurgis".


The list of released videos included in this entry are as follows:

Night 1: The 22 O'clock Guide (第1夜 -22時の案内人-), Apr 16, 2021. 
Night 2: The 26 O'clock Search (第2夜 -26時の探し物-), Jun 4, 2021. 
Night 3: The 4 O'clock Letter (第3夜 -4時の手紙-), Sept 12, 2021.
animes.genre: Coming of Age, Episodic, Fairy Tale, Fantasy, Iyashikei, Primarily Female Cast, Tragedy

animes.title: Arata naru Sekai: Mirai-hen
animes.author: ASCII Media Works, Aniplex, Kadokawa Shoten, MADHOUSE
animes.description:
Four high school girls in uniforms walk silently on the barren earth. These girls are time travelers who had been sent 6000 years into the future, from their present in which the same day is endlessly repeated, in order to evade human extinction.

They studied time travel in school, were examined by the aptitude test, and were sent to the future as told. What should they do now? They had no idea. The only thing they could take with them from the present was a light, toy-like cellphone. Of course, it receives no signal here.

As the girls are walking, they see strange birds flying in the sky, and a discolored river in the distance.

Then, one girl finds an abandoned house, and recognizes the name inscribed on the front gates.
animes.genre: Dystopian, Post-Apocalyptic, Primarily Female Cast, Sci-Fi, Time Manipulation, Time Skip

animes.title: Sekai no Yami Zukan
animes.author: ILCA
animes.description:
The anime will be in an omnibus short format that will tell stories of the strange and bizarre in our world, including UFOs, cryptids, curses, ancient civilizations, supernatural powers, spiritual experiences, bizarre cases, different dimensions, and urban legends, told in a picture show style.


(Source: Anime News Network)
animes.genre: Achromatic, Aliens, Cars, Episodic, Gore, Horror, Robots, Supernatural

animes.title: Beautiful World
animes.author: Studio Khara
animes.description: A music video directed by Tsurumaki Kazuya to promote the movies of Rebuild of Evangelion and the main music theme, "Beautiful World." The video includes both new animation and animation from the film.
animes.genre: Action, Cyberpunk, Drama, Mecha, Sci-Fi

animes.title: Narue no Sekai
animes.author: Central Park Media, Imagica, Lantis, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Media Factory, Pony Canyon, Studio Live
animes.description:
Meet Narue, an adorable schoolgirl with a secret. She's really an alien with powers right out of a sci-fi comic! But growing up is never easy, and sometimes it doesn't help when you're from outer space. Join our spunky heroine as she faces androids, alien invaders, and her first date with the boy next door. It's the sci-fi comedy that's a direct hit to your heart!

(Source: Central Park Media)
animes.genre: Aliens, Artificial Intelligence, Bullying, Comedy, Cosplay, Female Protagonist, Heterosexual, Male Protagonist, Robots, Romance, School, Sci-Fi, Shounen, Virtual World

animes.title: BIRTH
animes.author: ADV Films, Kaname Production, Victor Entertainment
animes.description: Aqualoid was a prosperous planet, but an attack from a mysterious life force, the Inorganics, transforms it into a post-apocalyptic shell of its former self. When Nam finds a mysterious sword, he is suddenly the object of a planet-wide chase. With the Inorganics closing in, will Nam and his friends discover the secret of the sword and save their world? Or will they destroy Aqualoid in favor of a new Birth?
animes.genre: Action, Adventure, Afterlife, Aliens, Aviation, Comedy, Desert, Ensemble Cast, Fantasy, Guns, Lost Civilization, Mecha, Psychological, Reincarnation, Robots, Sci-Fi, Shounen, Space

animes.title: The Perfect World
animes.description: Official music video for B: The Beginning's ending theme song The Perfect World. Performed by Marty Friedman feat. Jean-Ken Johnny, KenKen. The music video was released on the music producer Avex's official YouTube channel and it promotes the anime's image album soundtrack going on sale March 7, 2018--only 5 days after the anime is released.
animes.genre: Amnesia, Fugitive, Male Protagonist, Police, Revenge

animes.title: Ningyo no Kizu
animes.author: MADHOUSE
animes.description:
Legend has it that when you eat the flesh of a mermaid, you would live forever. Yuta and Mana are living proof of this... Together, they journey to various places trying to find meaning for their existence, or perhaps even a "cure" for their situation. One day, Yuta and Mana meet Masato, a little boy who seems terrified of his mother Misa. It seems to Yuta and Mana that mother and son have a very unusual relationship. What happens when Yuta and Mana decide to discover the dark secret Masato and Misa are hiding? And what about those monster-like creatures that have been appearing?

(Source: AniDB)
animes.genre: Body Horror, Drama, Fantasy, Female Protagonist, Gore, Horror, Male Protagonist, Mermaid, Mystery, Mythology, Primarily Adult Cast

animes.title: Warau Hyouteki
animes.author: Studio Pierrot
animes.description:
Yuzuru was an average teenager who had almost forgotten that he was betrothed to Azusa when he was only 6! Now arriving to claim what she feels is rightfully hers, only Satomi (Yuzuru's current girl friend) stands in her way... and with the mysterious and frightening powers that Azusa brings, Satomi won't stand in her way for long!

(Source: AniDB)
animes.genre: Archery, Demons, Horror, Love Triangle, Mystery, Psychological, Rape, Romance, School, School Club, Shounen, Supernatural, Yandere

animes.title: Takahashi Rumiko Anthology
animes.author: TV Tokyo, Tokyo Movie Shinsha
animes.description:
Rumic World TV (2003) consists of thirteen independent series based on short stories from 1987-2000 by Takahashi Rumiko. The episode order is not sorted based on the year the story was written. For example, the first episode "Tragedy of P"'s story was written in 1991 while the last episode "Senmuno inu"'s story was written in 1994.

(Source: AnimeNfo)
animes.genre: Anthology, Comedy, Drama, Romance, Shounen, Slice of Life, Supernatural

animes.title: The Supergal
animes.author: OB Planning, Shogakukan-Shueisha Productions, Studio Pierrot
animes.description:
Despite being a refugee from an extinct planet, having an alcoholic as a father and an airhead for a mother, Maris' biggest problem is that she's a Thanatosian. Considering that Thanatosians are six times stronger than the average Earthling it shouldn't be such a curse, especially in a galaxy where violence is rife. But the accidental destruction she wreaks on everything she touches —even with the exotic alloy restraints she wears— means she's constantly in debt. Every mission she's assigned to by the Inter-Galactic Space Patrol becomes a cash-drain when all the damages are docked from her wage. 

But when she's selected to rescue the rich and sexy Kogane Maru it's like a dream come true. After setting him free from the terror of his ruthless kidnapper his eternal gratitude will surely guarantee marriage —and an end to all her financial headaches. 

(Source: AniDB)
animes.genre: Action, Aliens, Comedy, Female Protagonist, Nudity, Sci-Fi, Space, Super Power, Wrestling

animes.title: It's a Rumic World: 50th Anniversary Weekly★Shonen Sunday
animes.author: Sunflowers
animes.description: The characters from Ranma 1/2, Urusei Yatsura, and Inuyasha all gather together in a short crossover to introduce the 50th Anniversary Weekly Shonen Sunday "Rumic World" Museum opening, celebrating Rumiko Takahashi's manga work.
animes.genre: Comedy, Crossover, Ensemble Cast, Meta, Sci-Fi

result.title: Akuyaku Reijou Level 99: Watashi wa Ura Boss desu ga Maou de wa Arimasen
result.author: AT-X, BS11, Jumondou, Jumondou, KADOKAWA, TOKYO MX
result.description:
This college kid wants nothing more than a quiet life. So when she’s reborn as Yumiella, the hidden villainess of an Otome RPG, she’s not exactly thrilled. Still yearning for peace, she abandons her evil duties to live a more discreet life. Until her gamer side kicks in and she accidentally reaches level 99! Now, everyone suspects that she’s the infamous Demon Lord. What future awaits her?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
